sentences.english: Can be freely selected according to their own taste of fermented bean curd.
sentences.chinese: 可以自由选择，按他们的腐乳自己的品味。

sentences.english: The key equipments used in sufu production were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 综述了腐乳生产关键设备。

sentences.english: Sufu fermentation consists of pehtze preparation and ripening according to production stage.
sentences.chinese: 腐乳生产按生产工段可分为前期培菌和后期发酵。

sentences.english: Mucor flavus is one of the main moulds used in sufu production in the northeast area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黄色毛霉是东北地区生产腐乳用的菌种之一。

sentences.english: Special with simple flavours applied to the shrimp but used the spicy fermented preserved tofu with the eggplant.
sentences.chinese: 制作虾的用料很简单，而在烹制茄子时用上了腐乳。

sentences.english: In order to develop traditional fermented food, this article introduces the production process of preserved bean curd.
sentences.chinese: 为传承传统的发酵食品，介绍了腐乳的生产工艺流程。

sentences.english: The result shows:the quality of fermented bean curd is ideal and it reduces the production costs.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果，腐乳质量理想，并可降低产品成本。

sentences.english: I often have fermented tofu with my morning congee.
sentences.chinese: 我早餐常吃稀饭配豆腐乳。

sentences.english: Fermented bean curd has a long history in China.
sentences.chinese: 腐乳，在我国有悠久的历史。
